Articles.Content:
This bug has existed since 1.4, and I am extremely disappointed to see that it has not been patched yet, despite the numerous reports.

I use a 4k monitor (3840 x 2160) and when using scatterer/EVE I would like to turn this down. Now, the report is in this section because whether my install is modded or not the issue remains:

Whenever I change my resolution from 3840 x 2160 to anything lower such as 2560 x 1440 or 1920 x 1080, scene changes will revert this back up to 4k. This usually happens when tabbing out and back in whilst the load screen is present, but has happened in flight too. My Settings.cfg contains the resolution I desire (2560 x 1440) but the game always reverts it back up to 3840 x 2160. Any help would be appreciated as how to stop this from happening, since this doesn't look like it will be fixed any time soon.

I have suffered the same thing - clicking on a delete box on KAC while the rest of the screen is still black after a sceen change triggers it for me, but I have also had it clicking on other mods as well.
A suggestion: the mod AnyRes makes it easy to change resolution quickly, so while it doesn't fix the problem, it can help to work around it
